Description - Supports prostate health - Gluten free - Quick release capsules - Traditional herb used in men's wellness for centuries - Provides 2,400 mg** of Saw Palmetto per serving - Nature's Truth delivers high-quality ingredients tested for purity and potency - Gluten Free, Wheat Free, Yeast Free, Milk Free, Lactose Free, Soy Free, Artificial Color Free, Artificial Flavor Free, Artificial Sweetener Free, and Preservative Free Take your wellness goals to the next level with Saw Palmetto! More than just a berry, Saw Palmetto has long been celebrated as a great herb supportive of men's wellness. At Nature's Truth, our unique formula provides you with the equivalent of 2,400 mg** of Saw Palmetto per serving, making it easier than ever to add this beneficial berry to your wellness routine. At Nature's Truth, we know how important a clean wellness experience is for you. That is why we use only the best ingredients when it comes to crafting our Saw Palmetto quick release capsules. Our superior formula is gluten free, dairy free, other common allergens, and created without any artificial colors, artificial flavors, artificial sweeteners, or preservatives so you can feel good about choosing Nature's Truth. **Equivalent from 100 mg 10:1 extract and 200 mg of whole berry powder. Made in the USA For adults, take one (2) quick release capsule up to three times daily, preferably with meals.© Nature's Truth, LLC.
